channel.title: Earth System Evolution
channel.description: Recent content on Earth System Evolution

item.description: Kristian Agas√∏ster Haaga is a PhD fellow at the Department of Earth science, University of Bergen. His research interests include causality in dynamical systems, paleoclimate analysis, geochemistry, and geology. In this project he has worked on the computation of causal measures from time series, including a novel causal asymmetry test, and the development of robust, high-performance open source code.
